play: Does I join in the voice channel and playing one song.
seek: Change the position of the current song (Just secounds is supported. Ex: ;seek 120).
skip: Skip the current song for the next to queue.
stop: Stop the song and clean the queue
volume: Change the volume of the song.
help: Sent this list here in your private.
prefix: Change my current prefix in the server.
invite: Sent my invit in your private.
loop: Enable and disable the repeat on the current song.
resume: Resume the song that is paused.
search: Search for the your desired song.
nowplaying: Show current song to be playing now.
playlist: Show the current list of song.
language: Change my language in your server.
remove: Removes a song from the queue.
